Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2008 10:28AM davitamorales wrote: God bless you for caring so much about your wife.   I had a mastectomy last october followed by 4 sessions of A/C chemo.  My tumor grade 3 but not spread .  But ER (triple Negative).   Anyway,  before making your decision,  check on a procedure called Mamosite which seems to be excellent for small tumors.  (www.mamosite.com)  It only takes 5 days without side effects...
Posts.Title: My wife just was diagnosed with IDC jn06 Labgal
